plays.text: Penalty to Darryl Sydor 2 minutes for High Sticking Teemu Selanne
Goal scored by Adam Graves assisted by Vincent Damphousse and Owen Nolan
Penalty to Sami Helenius 2 minutes for High Sticking Marco Sturm
Penalty to Adam Graves 2 minutes for Hooking Mike Modano
Penalty to Dave Manson 2 minutes for Delay of Game(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Owen Nolan 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Ed Belfour
Goal scored by Mike Modano assisted by Jason Arnott and Sergei Zubov
Penalty to Scott Hannan 2 minutes for Hooking Randy McKay
Goal scored by Patrick Marleau assisted by Bryan Marchment and Scott Hannan
Penalty to Derian Hatcher 2 minutes for Interference Owen Nolan
Goal scored by Scott Thornton assisted by Jeff Jillson and Patrick Marleau
Goal scored by Sergei Zubov assisted by Mike Modano and Darryl Sydor
